div.p: Guide in the implementation and the labeling of the xShare IPS+R, facilitating in the access and adoption of the selected specifications.
The content of this guide is organized following the BDAT (business, data, application, and technology) model:

ul.li: The business domain describes the business processes and rules that the xShare IPS+R is supporting.
The data domain describes the data model and the data exchange format.
The application domain describes what are the (software) components involved and how they interact, collaborate, or are coordinated. It also provides an overview of the system architecture.
The technology domain describes the technology stack and the infrastructure required to support the xShare IPS+R. This includes technical standards, specifications, and security considerations.
